BLIST.ITEM:
review planning:
selection of the review team, assignation of role and responsibilities, schedule the different review process steps
review entry and exit criteria may be defined

defect detection (aka preparation phase):
reviewers individually read the document to find and document its defects

review:
during the team meeting, each reported defect is accepted as a defect or refused as a false positive

correction phase:
the author of the review document fixes the reported defects

follow-up:
one, some or all the review participants check that all reported defects have been correctly fixed
the reviewers receive feedback about the review results

walkthrough:
one or more reviewers and the author meet to discuss a document

inspection:
each reviewer individually and systematically examines the document and records her/his findings
